content.p: Our current research focuses on the production of high value bioproducts such as vaccines, therapeutic proteins, medicinal metabolites and industrial enzymes in plants, microbial and mammalian cell systems which possess various applications on the detection, prevention and treatment of human and animal diseases as well as general health promotion. Development of biosensors and nanosensors for detection of diseases Design and bioproduction of vaccines for prophylactic applications Molecular pharming of bioproducts (enzymes, peptides) for therapeutic and health promotion purposes Advanced cancer treatment via epigenetic and combinatory therapies Manufacturing of technical reagents with industrial uses telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8018
